attributes.action: Demand that Clarence Mitchell makes a Public Apology...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For his recent statement in response to a question put to him re three babies being left alone while the parent's go out and party, Mr Mitchell insinuated that all British Parents leave their Children alone at night to go out and have fun, "putting Our kids to bed early so that we can have time to ourselves" his words "It's a British thing" are both insulting and damning. The majority of British Parents DO NOT behave in this manner and it is NOT a 'British thing'

We demand a Full Public Apology from Mr Mitchell.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
